message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you, and I'm open to negotiating further if you're interested.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire for a good deal, but I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value to me. Considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a new price of $850000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a price that works for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $750000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Can you consider this price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $750000. Considering your offer, I'm willing to make a new counteroffer of $825000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $825000. I'd like to make a final offer of $775000. This is my absolute maximum, and I'm hoping you'll consider it. If not, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that $775000 is your absolute maximum, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. Considering your offer, I'm willing to make a final counteroffer of $815000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
